item.title: About Dale Hassinger
item.description: Lead Systems Engineer, SME, vExpert 2020 If you can script it, You can Automate it… VMware vExpert 2020,2021 Email: Dale.Hassinger@vCrocs.info Location: Mechanicsburg, PA My current focus is Enterprise Automation and Monitoring. I am using VMware vRealize Automation to complete server builds, software installs, schedule VM snap shots, O365 automation, Citrix Management, Automate Data Center Flips, Server decommissions, Day 2 processes… For monitoring I use vRealize Operations for the “Single Pane of Glass” experience.
